body.name: Desktop Air Purifier with HEPA Filter for Office Bedroom Bathroom, Small USB Air Purifiers for Pollutants, Dust, Odor, Super Quiet Powered by USB No Adapter (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 24 mins
features: 【Powerful Function & Efficient】This small room air purifier adopts powerful air-duct system and brush-less DC motor which powerful function and release fresh air quickly, with strong turbine air guide technology and optimizes air circulation technology to purify the air in the whole room, effective clean the air in every minute.

【3-Stage Filtration& HEPA Filter】This desktop air purifier running in low power with 5W makes it extremely energy-saving and safe. With 1 HEPA filter + 2 activated carbon filter, 3-Stage filtration can effectively clean the air to 99%, make your breath more cleaner and more healthy.

【Low Noise Operation】 360°circulation purification, effectively clean the air. silence operation below 30dB offers your family a comfortable and quiet environment for sleeping. Perfect air purifier for kids, baby and family, protect family’s health and safety.

【Portable Size & Wide Coverage】This small air purifier size is 4.5*4.5*6.89 inch, weight:1lb/455g which is portable and charged by any USB port like power bank/laptop/any USB port. (Adapter not included) It can be conveniently placed everywhere. The air purifier covers width coverage up to 161sq.ft (15sq.m). Suitable for any space like office, bedroom, office, kitchen, living room, bathroom, small room and pet room.
【Replacement HEPA Filter】Replacement HEPA filter please see the asin: B09NQ54LNF. Or find the link in product description. We recommended to replace HEPA filter for every 3-6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars small and silent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a hit. My co worker live it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is small for an open office it won’t work but for a small office would be nice it comes with double filter and it’s even quieter than my fan and so I like that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No on/off button!
reviews.reviewText: First complaint is there is no on/off button. I purchased its specifically for smoke, and when gently blowing vape smoke into it, it just blows out the top. Have to keep plugged in the entire time, meaning you must unplug/plug to move it. I returned it for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier works so well. and it’s not loud at all! very small but that’s good to save space. and long enough cord to reach plugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have had it for almost a month. Filter is literally still clean. Doesn’t collect anything really, just for decor at this point. Not worth the money at all and was a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a good job
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my kids room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It’s almost completely silent, so I wasn’t sure it was even doing anything. I turned off my lights and went home. When I came back the next day, the air in my office was noticeably better than the rest of my building. I have an intern who reports to me, and the poor thing is constantly sneezing whenever he’s at work. I’m curious to see if this alleviates his suffering- because I definitely notice I’m breathing easier in my office. Definitely a great purchase.

La fuerza con la que avienta aire es limitada. El agua que se le pone para que aviento aire más frío ayuda, pero no es tan frío como un aire acondicionado, solo fresco. Tiene luces que se pueden apagada en la parte del tanque de agua, pero la luz al frente del aparato en Azul electrico es fuerte, no se puede apagada y molesta al dormir cuando el cuarto esta completamente oscuro, aunque se puede cubrir con una tela. En general, bien promedio, lo mejor es que es muy economico.
